posts.post_content:
Good morning,

I am looking for a 1911 NY highlanders composite PC, as shown here:

[url]http://jun15.hugginsandscott.com/cgi-bin/showitem.pl?lotno=245[/url]

If you have one to sell, please PM me.   Thank you.
I just consigned one to LOTG. Jeff or Al can probably tell you when that auction will be.
Yep, it will be one of many great postcards we'll have for the March auction!

[quote name="Bicem" post=1728185]Yep, it will be one of many great postcards we'll have for the March auction![/QUOTE]

That March auction is going to be very special. ;)

I have to wait until may?!?!?! Instant gratification!!!!!
:)
March, not May. Will be worth it as you know they are tough!
